     - name: Deploy on EC2
        uses: appleboy/ssh-action@v0.1.9
        with:
          host: ${{ secrets.EC2_HOST }}
          username: ${{ secrets.EC2_USER }}
          key: ${{ secrets.EC2_SSH_KEY }}
          script: |
            docker pull shivaaws69/netflix:latest
            docker stop py-app || true
            docker rm py-app || true
            docker run -d --name py-app -p 5000:5000 shivaaws69/netflix:latest
